docs.summary: The initial request to create a transaction object in order to authorize and optionally capture funds. The capture can be executed separately by the additional API call.There is the same API method is used to execute recurring payments. Please check the COF (credentials on file) section of the API to clarify the type of recurring transaction you would like to perform.

extra.description: Create a transaction object and only authorize the funds

examples.title: Create authorization and capture

extra.description: Create a transaction object to authorize and capture funds

examples.title: Create authorization (setup_cof_on_session)

extra.description: Create a transaction object and only authorize the funds with the intent for the subsequent transactions

members.doc: an on-session cardholder initiated transaction (like a one-click purchase)

members.name: setupCofOnSession
members.doc: an on-session payment followed by storing credentials to perform cardholder initiated transactions later (like one-click purchases)

members.name: setupCofRecurring
members.doc: an on-session payment followed by storing credentials to perform recurring merchant initiated transactions later (like regular subscription charges)

members.doc: an on-session payment followed by storing credentials to perform unscheduled merchant initiated transactions later (like automatic top-ups)

members.doc: an off-session recurring merchant initiated transaction (like a regular subscription charge)

members.doc: an off-session unscheduled merchant initiated transaction (like an automatic top-up)

docs.summary:
tax info types Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • CPF - CPF - for individual tax payers
  • CNPJ - CNPJ - for corporations

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • PROCESSING
  • AUTHORIZED
  • DECLINED
  • CAPTURED
  • VOIDED
  • REFUNDED
  • PARTIALLY_REFUNDED
  • PENDING
  • PENDING_REFUND
  • CHARGED_BACK
  • FAILED
  • REDIRECTED
  • CANCELED

Possible values are:
  • OTHER
  • FRAUD
  • COMPLIANCE
  • DUPLICATE_PAYMENT
  • ABANDONED_PAYMENT
  • MERCHANT_REQUEST
  • BUYER_REQUEST

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • PROCESSING
  • DECLINED
  • SUCCEEDED
  • CANCELED
  • NEEDS_ACTION
  • PENDING

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • PENDING
  • FAILED
  • SUCCEEDED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • PENDING
  • FAILED
  • SUCCEEDED
  • REVERSED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • PENDING
  • FAILED
  • SUCCEEDED
  • REVERSED
  • CANCELED

Possible values are:
  • OTHER
  • FRAUD_CARD_PRESENT
  • FRAUD_CARD_ABSENT
  • DUPLICATE_PROCESSING
  • SERVICES_NOT_PROVIDED
  • CANCELED_RECURRING
  • NOT_AS_DESCRIBED
  • COUNTERFEIT
  • MISREPRESENTATION
  • CANCELED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • RFI_OPEN
  • RFI_UNDER_REVIEW
  • RFI_CLOSED
  • CHARGEBACK_OPEN
  • CHARGEBACK_UNDER_REVIEW
  • WON
  • LOST

Possible values are:
  • OTHER
  • ACCESS_ACTIVITY_LOG
  • BILLING_ADDRESS
  • CANCELLATION_POLICY
  • CANCELLATION_POLICY_DISCLOSURE
  • CANCELLATION_REBUTTAL
  • CUSTOMER_COMMUNICATION
  • CUSTOMER_EMAIL_ADDRESS
  • CUSTOMER_NAME
  • CUSTOMER_PURCHASE_IP
  • CUSTOMER_SIGNATURE
  • DUPLICATE_CHARGE_DOCUMENTATION

  • SERVICE_DATE
  • SERVICE_DOCUMENTATION
  • SHIPPING_ADDRESS
  • SHIPPING_CARRIER
  • SHIPPING_DATE
  • SHIPPING_DOCUMENTATION
  • SHIPPING_TRACKING_NUMBER

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - unspecified
  • PHYSICAL - a physical good
  • DIGITAL - a digital good
